name: Get Those Bugs
storyline: You are a commander tasked with defending the mysterious Artefacts from the invading bug forces. Utilize strategic deployment of powerful cards and engagement tactics to guide your heroic party of magic slinging soldiers in their mission to exterminate the approaching horde.
summary:
Get Those Bugs is a tower defense focused on card combos, mechanical synergies, and a limited tower count.

Command your party of magical soldiers in their mission to exterminate the invading bug forces before they destroy the powerful and mysterious artefacts.

Strategize using simplified card based gameplay to create units powerful enough to take out thousands of enemies.
